availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas S. Williams (Johnson County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer. Johnson County, Kentucky, native. Married to Malissa Stafford Williams in Johnson County on July 15, 1856. Father of John D. Williams, Warwick Williams, and Milton Williams. Farmer in Johnson County in 1860. Farmer in Johnson County in 1863

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 154.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, Hoods Fork, p. 143A-B.
